name: ISS - Infuriating Space Simulator
description:
You are a cosmonaut lost in space and you must reach your living room because your favorite show is about to begin. You must first open the door by grabbing the handle and then go in your room. Beware of the gravitating objects around your living room. You can grab any handle (on the room or on any flying object).

Controls :

  • W / S to move Forward / Backward
  • A / D to move Left / Right
  • Q / E / to move Down / Up
  • 4 / 6 to Roll
  • 8 / 2 to Pitch
  • 7 / 9 to Yaw
  • Hold Space bar to grab the closest handle
  • Ctrl to change Camera

Best with a numeric keypad.

This is a game made for the Ludum Dare 37, with the theme "One Room". Game made by :

  • Tim Guthmann : Programmer
  • Vincent Jalliffier-Merlon : Artist and Sound Designer
  • Boris Kolimaga : Artist and Composer
  • Sophie Tutusaus : Artist
